name: Uni
info: A Sinner adept at defending. Can block 2 enemies at the same time and increases Defense by 5%.
criminalRecord:
An Eastside plastic surgeon who runs a mysterious underground clinic. According to investigations, the subject secretly works with many different forces, and has helped Eastside's big entertainment companies catapult stars to fame.

The subject once created a type of cosmetic surgery that can completely swap one person's face with another's. However, according to investigations, this popular operation became intertwined with many missing persons cases, and was quickly banned.

--

According to observations, the subject can indeed use mirrors to cast her power. At present, all mirrors in the operating room have been destroyed. Since getting detained by the MBCC, the subject has gradually calmed down, and her attention has shifted from face-stealing to Chief. The MBCC will continue to monitor the subject's power so as to prevent her from committing further crimes.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
Her power can turn [[[mania |Mania Crystals]]] into mirrors. Crystallized mirror surfaces are extremely hard and can withstand and reflect multiple impacts. These mirrors show people the reflections they desire, which the subject then manipulates to interfere with reality.

+++* Awakening Signs
It is difficult to pinpoint when exactly the subject awakened her power. It may have been during medical school, when she was exposed to contaminants from relevant experiments.

+++* Corruption State
Corrupted to a medium degree, reflected specifically in her mental state. The subject has severe obsessive-compulsive disorder, and tries obsessively to control everything related to her field of work.
ecbFlavourText: How many fragments must I collect to bring you back from the mirror...?
interrogation1:
When the Chief arrives to interrogate Uni about a missing persons case, she demonstrates her extreme obsessiveness, referring to the orderly interrogation room as "messy" and insulting the Chief's appearance, though she compliments their eyes and suggests changing their other features to accentuate them. She is sullen and impatient, and while she acknowledges that the disappeared actors were her clients, she denies any knowledge of what happened to them. The Chief attempts to use the [[[Shackles]]] to compel an answer, but they are repelled by a purple light when they try to push deeper. She accuses them of trying to frame her for a crime just because she's a [[[Sinner]]], but the Chief replies that they have no intention of wronging her and that despite being a prison warden, it's part of their principles to get to know the Sinners under their watch. Uni recounts a version of the story of the Ugly Duckling where the duckling drowns and dies in its pursuit of beauty. She then conjures a mirror that she claims reveals the deepest desire of anybody who looks into it, however, the Chief only sees their own reflection. When they relate this to Uni, she excitedly proclaims that the Chief is the "blank canvas" that she has been looking for. The interrogation is interrupted by [[[Nightingale]]], who tells them that a [[[city council |City Councilor]]] is demanding that the Chief bring Uni to a function in Eastside that night, due to her influence and reputation as a star-maker. Nightingale also gives them a photo of [[[list of minor characters |Luna]]], Uni's identical twin sister who went missing three years prior. The Chief further ponders the fact that Uni's reflection did not appear in her own mirror.

Uni mocks those missing persons that they got what they deserved. As the interrogation progresses, you gradually realize Uni has her own agenda. You were told that Uni is an irreplaceable part of the star-making industry, thus you decide to accept the councilor's invitation and infiltrate the cocktail party to uncover the truth.
interrogation2:
At the Councilor's cocktail party, Uni sticks to the corner, eating desserts while disparaging the other guests for their shallowness. The Councilor approaches them with a young woman who is beautiful, but hasn't yet broken through in the DisCity entertainment world. He requests that Uni give her cosmetic surgery in order to turn her into a star, and the Chief agrees, seeing it as an opportunity to see Uni's process and learn something about the missing persons case. The actress reveals that she has an audition for a movie the next day, and has researched the director's favorite type of woman so that she can change her face to be more likely to get the role. The Chief doesn't approve, which strikes her as ridiculous; as Uni goes into her clinic ahead of them, the Chief tricks her into believing that they have a different acting opportunity for her that requires her current face, and she leaves. The Chief follows Uni into the clinic and finds it meticulously clean, but filled with hundreds of cracked mirrors. They explore and find a portrait on the wall made out of pieces of different people's headshots, cut up and affixed together to make an image that looks like Uni's face. Each of the pieces comes from one of the missing persons, and the figure's eyes are from a photo of the Chief. Uni appears and attacks them, forcing the Chief to use the Shackles against her.

In this greed-filled cocktail party, Uni shows you the immoral and hypocritical side of the guests. You lure the girl who wants plastic surgery away with her desire, but you fall into Uni's trap yourself; this has all been a plan to approach you. Her real target is none other than you.
interrogation3:
The Chief enters Uni's [[[spiritual energy |spiritual realm]]], where they take the role of Uni's twin sister Luna and encounter a young Uni living in an orphanage. Uni treats her sister almost as an extension of herself, insisting that they are each other's "reflection" and demanding that everything between them share "symmetry". A group of other kids accuse her of cheating on the test and stealing their candy, leading Uni to get into a fight with them when they claim that she was trying to impress Luna. After the Chief saves her, Luna promises that she and Uni will be together forever. Later in time, as adults, Luna sits on a bed in their shared apartment, her face covered in bandages. Uni hysterically asks why Luna left her to become an actress, saying that Luna ruined her face and wasn't returning her calls. Uni tries to talk with her sister, but Luna is silent. The memories break down into chaotic glimpses, and the Chief witnesses a fight between Uni and another woman, and then Uni's grief at having accidentally disfigured her. The Chief tries to talk to Uni and affirm to her that Luna is gone, but Uni insanely claims that Luna is still with her, trapped inside her mirror. As her spiritual realm collapses, the Chief finally gets through to her by explaining that she is mistaking them for Luna because Luna and the Chief were both people trying to protect her. Back in reality, the Chief tells her that the Shackles are not a cage, but a bridge between them, and Uni accepts it as the proof of a truly unbreakable bond with another person which she has been yearning for. A week later, Nightingale reports to the Chief that Uni's clinic has been closed down and the missing persons located, although each is missing a feature of their face, and the parts are still unfound. She gives the Chief a framed photograph of Luna that was also found inside the clinic. The Chief says they will give it Uni as a remembrance. In Uni's mirror, the Chief sees a sleeping woman with a pieced-together face.

Looks are deceiving. Souls are ugly. Only her twin sister who's linked to her by blood can be trusted. Uni tries in vain to put together her sister's face again and bring her back, but you cannot complete this fake consolation. The shackles grow and link you and Uni together. This is a relationship that exists solely between the two of you, beyond all falsehood and connected by the souls.
arrestRec1: The subject has long been engaged in underground cosmetic surgery work in Eastside. Some of her clients disappeared after undergoing surgery. After a tip-off, she was confirmed to be a Sinner and arrested in the operating room.
arrestRec2: In all the relevant cases, the missing persons had visited Uni's clinic and underwent cosmetic surgery. The subject denies all accusations, claiming that her mirrors only show people the faces they desire to have, and does not have the capacity for crime.
arrestRec3: The subject grew up in an orphanage and harbors strong hostility towards everyone except her sister. She has shown strong learning abilities since childhood, and was admitted to Banyan Medical College as an adult to conduct research on the "physical alteration and clinical recovery of mutants". Her twin sister Luna failed to get into the program.
arrestRec4:
Before dropping out, the subject had a fight with her sister over her career, which led to her scratching her sister's face. Not long after, Luna disappeared, and the subject dropped out of school and vanished.

A year later, she reappeared as a cosmetician. Ever since, missing persons cases related to her increased year by year.
servingTerm1: The subject has extreme obsessive-compulsive disorder. She insists that everything in her room be arranged symmetrically, and bars anyone else from entering her room. According to observations, the subject shows an equally strong desire to control personal items.
servingTerm2: The subject has an insatiable sweet tooth. She accepts almost any food that is sweet and has an enormous appetite. Once, another Sinner pranked her by replacing her usual high-end desserts with cheap pastries, but the subject did not get angry after finding out. It seems that she doesn't care about food quality, just sweetness.
servingTerm3: Has an extremely low desire to socialize, and almost never tries to chat with other Sinners and staff. Some Sinners have gone to consult her about plastic surgery out of curiosity, but the staff promptly stopped her from inspecting their faces.
servingTerm4: Highly possessive of the Chief, she often uses the shackles in a brash manner to confirm the Chief's presence. After the Chief coaxed her not to do so, she changed her behavior for the better, opting instead to invite the Chief to spend time with her.

supervision1:
++* ⚠ Kid Repellent

//Uni is known in the Bureau for not getting along with kids.//

**System Notifications:** Uni is known in the Bureau for not getting along with kids. Wherever she goes, no little Sinners are allowed to go within ten meters around her.

* **Prompt:** Are they really that incompatible...
supervision2:
++* ⚠ Mirror

//Many people are curious about Uni's magical mirror.//

**System Notifications:** Many people are curious about Uni's magical mirror that's said to reflect the face you desire the most deep down. But Uni herself doesn't seem to like to look at the mirror and always covers it with a piece of cloth.

* **Prompt:** Everyone has something from the past they don't want to face.
supervision3:
++* ⚠ Paranoid

//You can't find a place tidier than Uni's room in the entire MBCC.//

**System Notifications:** You can't find a place tidier than Uni's room in the entire MBCC. The arrangement of objects is absolutely symmetric. Even the books on her desk are strictly aligned.

* **Prompt:** You must be extra careful when you visit her.

**System Notifications:** If you mess up the arrangement of her books, she'll be passive-aggressive for days.
supervision4:
++* ⚠⚠ Compliment

//You receive a complaint from a staff member.//

**System Notifications:** Supervision System: You received a request from a staff member. Please confirm.

* **Prompt:** Confirm

**Staff Member:** Chief, help! I've been threatened!

**Staff Member:** That Sinner, Uni, she's so scary!

**Staff Member:** She, she wants to cut off my nose!

**System Notifications:** Supervision System: This is the end of the message. Go and inquire?

* **Prompt:** Yes

**Uni:** Are you looking for me?

**Chief:** Yes.

**Uni:** Be quick, I'm busy.

**Chief:** Ahem, so, a staff member told me you threatened her.

**Uni:** Threatened? I didn't.

**Chief:** I believe that wasn't your intention. But she's indeed terrified, saying you want to cut off her nose...

**Chief:** Think carefully. Did you say anything that could have led to the misunderstanding?

**Uni:** ...

**Uni:** Indeed, I ran into a staff member with a pretty nice nose, so I complimented her.

**Chief:** ...How did you compliment her?

**Uni:** Your nose can become part of my collection.

**Chief:** ...

**Chief:** Next time when you're feeling generous with compliments, just say "You have a pretty nose."
supervision5:
++* ⚠⚠ Heart-Broken Moment

//During the lunch break, several staff members chatter about something in a huddle.//

**System Notifications:** During the lunch break, several staff members chatter about something in a huddle.

* **Prompt:** Go take a look

**Staff A:** Wow! Isn't this a signed poster of that popular idol group?

**Staff B:** Hehe, I got it through a friend! Isn't it so cool?

**Staff C:** They all look so good... That's why they're called "visual kings" I guess...

**Uni:** ...Hmm.

**System Notifications:** Passing by, Uni glances at the poster they're holding and gives a disdainful sneer.

**Uni:** You call these guys "visual kings"?

**Uni:** Awful bone structure, disproportional features, dead eyes. Nothing special at all.

**System Notifications:** The staff exchange looks and one of them points at one of the guys on the poster and starts arguing indignantly.

**Staff B:** What about him then? His face has a perfect golden ratio and is very unique! Surely you can't find any flaws on his face?

**Uni:** He does have the prettiest face among the group, and he should thank me for that.

**Staff B:** ...He should thank you? What do you mean...?

**Uni:** I gave him his face.

**Uni:** You have no idea how much work I've put into turning that abominable face into something decent.

**Staff B:** ...
supervision6:
++* ⚠⚠⚠ Sweet Tooth

//At lunch hour, Uni gets her lunch at the cafeteria.//

**System Notifications:** At lunchtime, you see Uni sitting in the cafeteria, facing only two cheesecakes on her plate.

* **Prompt:** Go and try to talk to her

**Chief:** Hi there, Uni.

**Uni:** It's you. What are you here for?

**Chief:** Hmm... What did you have for breakfast yesterday?

**Uni:** Ignis's creme brulee.

**Chief:** And what did you have for lunch yesterday?

**Uni:** Kelvin's ice cream.

**Chief:** What about for dinner?

**Uni:** Ignis's creme brulee and Kelvin's ice cream.

**Chief:** ...

**Uni:** Is there something wrong?

**Chief:** So, the kind-hearted cafeteria lady came to me yesterday morning.

**Chief:** She said you seemed to be having only desserts for days and she was concerned about your health.

**Uni:** Tsk, are you even micromanaging me on my diet?

* **Prompt:** Yes.
 * **Chief:** Of course. It's part of my job to ensure your health.
 * **Chief:** Aren't you gonna get bad teeth for eating so much sugar every day...
 * **Uni:** I always brush my teeth meticulously after each meal. I've never had a bad tooth in my life.
 * **Chief:** Um...
 * **Uni:** Please mind your own business. Talking to you spoils my appetite.

* **Prompt:** No.
 * **Chief:** You're free to choose what you eat in a day, of course. I only want to offer some suggestions.
 * **Chief:** You're a doctor yourself. I'm sure you're more aware of the importance of a balanced diet than I am. Besides desserts, perhaps you can consider incorporating other foods?
 * **Chief:** Things are different now. You can have your favorite food whenever you want. No one will snatch it from you.
 * **Uni:** ...Okay. Stop nagging.
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
You took the trouble to bring me all the way here... Is it because you are insecure with that face of yours? Don't worry, at least your eyes are not bad.

[Raise to Phase 1]
"I don't mind getting stronger, but is it really necessary?"

[Raise to Phase 3]
"Mirrors can reveal the human heart. Tell me, what reflection do you see in my mirror? A human figure, or just greed and lust?"

[Level Start]
Come. Let me see if you're still salvageable.

[Win Battles]
Don't laugh too hard, or else your eyes will get wrinkles.

[Lose Battles]
A deserter and a stray. What a match made in heaven.

[Ultimate Skill]
Look how hideous you are!

[Die in Battles]
I have to... bring her back...

[Greeting]
Your eyes are as pretty as always. Calm down... with these shackles around, I won't do anything to you.

[Conversation 1]
Keep everything where it should be. You can't even do that?

[Conversation 2]
What beautiful proportions. This face is clearly their greatest asset. Why are they in a rush to sell it?

[Conversation 3]
My mirror reveals one's greatest desires, yet I can't seem to see yours. Chief, is there really nothing you desire... or are they not to be seen?

[Special Conversation 1]
In Eastside, where people live and die for entertainment, a pretty face is a ticket to the party. Yet there is a price to pay to realize this dream. We're both in this game for something we want. 

[Special Conversation 2]
The star of tomorrow? Ha, you like that mass-produced trash? I don't even need my power to know what they want. It's always the same look... They're worse than Corruptors. At least Corruptors are each hideous in their own ways.

[Special Conversation 3]
Appearances can be tweaked and changed, but eyes cannot. Eyes become worthless once the light in them dies out... but yours are different. Want to give them to me? I'll try to be as gentle as possible.

[Full Compliance]
You remind me of someone... Sincere, passionate, and with scorching eyes only for me. May I keep your eyes forever, too?

[Idle]
...All I'm missing is a pair of eyes. Wait a bit longer. I'll bring you back soon...

[Annoyed]
I want you to be close to me... but not this close. Control yourself and mind your manners. Adjutant Nightingale hasn't left yet.

[Special Attention]
Am I the most special one in your eyes?

[Dispatch]
Services other than surgery? That's not included in the price. Remember to pay separately in full.

[Dispatch Complete]
Hmm? This trash makes you happy?

[Level Up]
That's all? This is just some cheap stuff.

guide.title: Summary
guide.text: She can tank a lot and that's it. Low damage, no utility, the only thing she has going for her is a very high defense stat. But since there aren't any notable mechanics to make use of that there are few uses for her.

crimebrandSets.name: Tanky
crimebrandSets.note: Standard tanky build to increase block and defense.

crimebrandSets.name: Ultimate damage
crimebrandSets.note: Increase the burst skill damage she deals. Since her Normal Attacks are already weak it is fine that their damage is decreased.

crimebrandSets.name: Team buff
crimebrandSets.note: Boost the team's damage for the first 30 seconds of battle. Good for short battles like BFL.

shackles.title: Ring-Shaped Array
shackles.description: The [Mirror] produced by casting [Mirror Refraction] and its corresponding cap is increased by 1.

shackles.title: Energy Overflowing
shackles.description: At the start of combat gain 10 Energy.

skills.name: Visage Alteration
skills.description: Uni attacks by manipulating mirrors, dealing (Attack*96%) physical damage each time.

skills.name: Mirror Refraction
skills.description: Uni grants 3 [Mirror Shields] to the designated Sinner. [Mirror Shield]: Enables the target allied Sinner to evade the incoming damage once. The damage evasion limit is Uni's Defense*1000%. The target will still take the damage exceeding that limit. The Mirror Shield will shatter after the damage evasion and deal (Uni's Defense*70%) Physical Damage to all enemies within the surrounding the 3x3 square. A sinner can receive up to 3 [Mirror Shields]. Upon Uni's death, all the Mirror Shields on the field will explode

skills.name: Cracked Facade
skills.description: The damage caused by the shattered [Mirror Shield] increases by 20%

skills.name: Fragmented Reflection
skills.description: For each shattered [Mirror Shield], Uni gains a 2% Defense boost. The effect stacks up to 5 times and lasts for 6 seconds.

attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
What sort of face are you looking for? One that launches a thousand ships? Name your heart's desire. I shall fulfill it. 

[Greeting]
You come here every day. Which skin here has caught your fancy? Heed my words: None of these monotonously beautiful faces is worthy of those stunning eyes of yours.

[Ordinary Contact 1]
To become a great skin painter, one must have seen beauty and ugliness in their endless variations, and touched countless bones with their infinite details. Otherwise, you can't fool the discerning eyes of shrewd mortals and will thwart the fulfillment of your customer's obsession.

[Ordinary Contact 2]
Here is my rule: I paint all the features on the skin, except for the eyes. You use your own when you're back in the world of the living, however beautiful the other features I've created are. Ah, they have it right when they say that eyes are the window to the soul. What I wouldn't give for a pair of eyes like yours! So rare and so pure they are...

[Idle] 
The cheekbones area needs t touch-up... Ah, still not as good as I hoped. Perhaps the bone structure itself is flawed. I need to start over.

[Annoyed]
Will you stop tugging at my sleeve? You're making my hand tremble. If the buyer goes home with a pockmarked face, they might visit your bedside in the middle of the night to give you a dressing-down.

[Special Attention] 
You like watching me work? You can watch, but you'd better not disturb me, or... I might claim your most striking feature for myself.

[Level Up}
My works have been "superficial", but from now on, I'll be able to capture the essence of the subject.

voicelines.Conversation 2 - EN: What beautiful proportions. This face is clearly their greatest asset. Why are they in a rush to sell it?
voicelines.Conversation 2 - JP: 額幅で縦三等分、目幅で横五等分。黄金比だ。この顔は彼らにとって最も価値あるものだというのに、なぜ急いで売ろうとするんだ？
voicelines.Conversation 2 - KR: 가로 3등분, 세로 5등분의 비율이 균등한 것. 그것이 얼굴의 황금비율이지. 얼굴이야말로 그들에게 가장 값진 것인데, 왜 그걸 팔아넘기려는 걸까?
voicelines.Conversation 2 - CN: 三庭五眼，黄金比例。明明这张脸已经算是他们身上最值钱的东西了，为什么还要急着抛售它呢？
voicelines.Conversation 2 - TW: 三庭五眼，黃金比例。明明這張臉已經算是他們身上最值錢的東西了，為什麼還要急著拋售它呢？
voicelines.Conversation 3 - EN: My mirror reveals one's greatest desires, yet I can't seem to see yours. Chief, is there really nothing you desire... or are they not to be seen?
voicelines.Conversation 3 - JP: 私の鏡には見た者が最も望む顔が映るのだが、君の欲望はよく見えないな。局長、君は本当に何も求めていないのか？……それとも、他の企みがあるのか？
voicelines.Conversation 3 - KR: 내 거울은 사람들이 가장 되고 싶은 얼굴을 보여줘. 그런데 당신의 욕망은 보이지 않아. 국장, 정말 아무것도 원하지 않는 거야, 아님… 다른 꿍꿍이가 있는 거야?
voicelines.Conversation 3 - CN: 我的镜子能照出人最渴求的面容，但我看不清你的欲望。局长，你是真的无欲无求……还是另有所图呢？
voicelines.Conversation 3 - TW: 我的鏡子能照出人最渴求的面容，但我看不清你的欲望。局長，你是真的無欲無求……還是另有所圖呢？
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - EN: In Eastside, where people live and die for entertainment, a pretty face is a ticket to the party. Yet there is a price to pay to realize this dream. We're both in this game for something we want.
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - JP: 娯楽はニューシティの勲章であり、美しい顔はこのお祭り騒ぎの入場チケットだ。夢の実現には、代償を払わなければならない——私たちは、互いに協力してそれぞれの目的を達成しよう。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - KR: 유흥은 신성의 훈장 같은 거야. 그리고 아름다운 얼굴이 그 카니발의 입장권이지. 꿈을 이루려면 대가를 지불해야 해… 각자 필요한 걸 갖는 거야.
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - CN: 娱乐是新城的勋章，一张漂亮的脸蛋儿则是这场狂欢的入场券。实现梦想，也要付出代价——我们，各取所需。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - TW: 娛樂是新城的勳章，一張漂亮的臉蛋則是這場狂歡的入場券。實現夢想，也要付出代價——我們，各取所需。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - EN: The star of tomorrow? Ha, you like that mass-produced trash? I don't even need my power to know what they want. It's always the same look... They're worse than Corruptors. At least Corruptors are each hideous in their own ways.
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - JP: 明日のスター？はっ、そういった量産型が好みなのか？能力を使わずとも、彼らの望みは分かる。月並みなセンスにマンネリ顔……死瞳の方がマシだよ。少なくとも、それぞれ違った醜さがある。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - KR: 유망주? 흥, 그런 양산형을 좋아하나? 난 능력을 쓰지 않아도 그들이 원하는 게 뭔지 알 수 있어. 조금의 변화도 없는 똑같은 아름다움… 그럴 바엔 괴변체가 되는 게 나아. 최소한 특별하기라도 하니까.
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - CN: 明日之星？哈，你喜欢那种量产货？我不用能力都知道他们想要什么，审美趋同，千篇一律……还不如死役，至少丑得各有特色。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - TW: 明日之星？哈，你喜歡那種量產貨？我不用能力都知道他們想要什麼，審美趨同，千篇一律……還不如死役，至少醜得各有特色。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - EN: Appearances can be tweaked and changed, but eyes cannot. Eyes become worthless once the light in them dies out... but yours are different. Want to give them to me? I'll try to be as gentle as possible.
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - JP: 外見は自由に調整できるが、瞳は無理だ。一度目の表情が死ねば、希少価値はなくなる……だが、君は違うね。私のものになる気はないか？できるだけ優しくしよう。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - KR: 외모는 마음대로 바꿀 수 있지만, 눈은 그럴 수 없지. 눈빛은 한번 죽어버리면 다신 특별해질 수 없거든… 그런데 당신은 달라. 어때, 나의 소유물이 되어보지 않겠어? 최대한 부드럽게 대해줄게.
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - CN: 外表可以肆意调整改变，但眼睛不行。眼神一旦死去就不再稀罕……但你不一样。如何，想成为我的所有物吗？我会尽量温柔的。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - TW: 外表可以肆意調整改變，但眼睛不行。眼神一旦死去就不再稀罕……但你不一樣。如何，想成為我的所有物嗎？我會盡量溫柔的。
voicelines.Full Compliance - EN: You remind me of someone... Sincere, passionate, and with scorching eyes only for me. May I keep your eyes forever, too?
voicelines.Full Compliance - JP: 君を見ていると、ある人のことを思い出す……誠実で、情熱的で、太陽のような目で私を、私だけをずっと見つめてくれる人だ。君の目も、永遠に私の元に留まってくれるか？
voicelines.Full Compliance - KR: 당신을 보면 누군가 떠올라… 진실하고 열정적인 그 태양 같은 눈동자로 계속해서 나를 보고, 또 나만 바라보지. 당신의 눈으로 영원히 나만 바라봐 줄 수 있을까?
voicelines.Full Compliance - CN: 你让我想起一个人……真诚，炙热，那双太阳般的眼睛一直看着我，也只看向我。你的眼睛，也可以永远停在我这儿吗？
voicelines.Full Compliance - TW: 你讓我想起一個人……真誠，炙熱，那雙太陽般的眼睛一直看著我，也只看向我。你的眼睛，也可以永遠停在我這嗎？
voicelines.Idle - EN: ...All I'm missing is a pair of eyes. Wait a bit longer. I'll bring you back soon...
voicelines.Idle - JP: ……足りないのは瞳だけだ。もう少し待ってくれ。すぐにあなたを連れ戻すから……
voicelines.Idle - KR: …이제 눈만 남았어. 조금만 기다려, 금방 여기로 돌아오게 해줄게…
voicelines.Idle - CN: ……只差一双眼睛。再等等，我马上就能把你带回来了……
voicelines.Idle - TW: ……只差一雙眼睛。再等等，我馬上就能把你帶回來了……
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: I want you to be close to me... but not this close. Control yourself and mind your manners. Adjutant Nightingale hasn't left yet.
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: 私も、君には近づいてもらいたいが……これは近すぎないか？落ち着け、行動には気をつけるんだ。まだナイチンゲール副官がいるのだから。
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 나도 당신이 좀 더 가까이 있었으면 좋겠지만… 이 정도로 가까이 오지는 마. 행동 조심하라고, 나이팅게일 부관도 있잖아.
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 虽然我也希望你离我近些……但也别这么近。安分点儿，注意举止，夜莺副官还没走呢。
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 雖然我也希望你離我近些……但也別這麼近。安分點，注意舉止，夜鶯副官還沒走呢。
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: Am I the most special one in your eyes?
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: ふむ……君にとって、最も特別なのは私なのか？
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 왜 그래? 네 눈에는 내가 제일 특별한가?
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 怎么……在你的眼里，我是最特别的吗？
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 怎麼……在你的眼裡，我是最特別的嗎？
voicelines.Dispatch - EN: Services other than surgery? That's not included in the price. Remember to pay separately in full.
voicelines.Dispatch - JP: 手術以外の仕事？それなら別料金だ。忘れずに支払うように。
voicelines.Dispatch - KR: 수술이 아니네? 비용은 따로 청구할 테니 기억해둬.
voicelines.Dispatch - CN: 手术外的工作？价格另算，记得付清。
voicelines.Dispatch - TW: 手術外的工作？價格另算，記得付清。
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - EN: Hmm? This trash makes you happy?
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - JP: ん？こんな小さなゴミで、それほど喜ぶのか？
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - KR: 음…? 쓰레기를 좀 주워 왔을 뿐인데 이렇게 기뻐하다니.
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - CN: 嗯？带了些小垃圾就能让你这么开心？
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - TW: 嗯？帶了些小垃圾就能讓你這麼開心？
voicelines.Level Up - EN: That's all? This is just some cheap stuff.
voicelines.Level Up - JP: これは、おまけのようなものだ。
voicelines.Level Up - CN: 这点东西，也就算个添头吧。
voicelines.Level Up - TW: 這點東西，也就算個添頭吧。

voicelines.Attire Obtained - EN: What sort of face are you looking for? One that launches a thousand ships? Name your heart's desire. I shall fulfill it.
voicelines.Attire Obtained - JP: 国色天香でも美冠玉の如しでも、何でも言ってくれ。この皮にどんな美しさを描いてほしいんだ？必ず君を満足させよう。
voicelines.Attire Obtained - KR: 과거엔 그저 껍데기와 육신만을 그려냈지만… 이젠 원기를 그려낼 수 있겠어.
voicelines.Attire Obtained - CN: 国色天香亦或美如冠玉，说吧，想要在这皮囊上画出何种姿色？我都可以满足你。
voicelines.Attire Obtained - TW: 國色天香亦或美如冠玉，說吧，想要在這皮囊上畫出何種姿色？我都可以滿足你。
voicelines.Greeting - EN: You come here every day. Which skin here has caught your fancy? Heed my words: None of these monotonously beautiful faces is worthy of those stunning eyes of yours.
voicelines.Greeting - JP: 毎日私の所に来ているが、なりたい美しい顔を見つけたのか？忠告しておくが、こうした量産型の美しさは君の瞳にふさわしくない。
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 매일 같이 날 찾아오다니… 이 중에 어떤 껍데기가 그렇게나 마음에 들어? 잘 들어. 이런 판에 박은 것처럼 아름다운 얼굴들은, 네 눈에 비할 바가 못돼.
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 日日往我这儿跑，是看上哪副漂亮皮囊了？听我一句劝，这千篇一律的美艳脸庞，都撑不起你那双眼睛。
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 日日往我這跑，是看上哪副漂亮皮囊了？聽我一句勸，這千篇一律的美豔臉龐，都撐不起你那雙眼睛。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: To become a great skin painter, one must have seen beauty and ugliness in their endless variations, and touched countless bones with their infinite details. Otherwise, you can't fool the discerning eyes of shrewd mortals and will thwart the fulfillment of your customer's obsession.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - JP: 良い皮を描きたければ、老いも若きも、美しきも醜きも見なければならないし、艶やかな顔にも枯れた骨にも触れなければならない。そうでなければ、抜け目ない人間を欺くことも、愚かな願望も叶えることもできないだろう。つまり、商売にならないんだよ。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - KR: 좋은 껍데기를 그려내기 위해서는 남녀노소를 보고 아름다운 얼굴과 백골을 모두 만져봐야 해. 그렇지 않으면 똑똑한 인간을 속일 수 없고, 망령의 한도 풀 수 없어, 그럼 이 장사도 못한다고 봐야지.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - CN: 要想画出好的皮囊，就得看遍美丑老少，摸过红颜枯骨。否则，可骗不过那些精明的凡人，也圆不了那些个痴心妄念，撑不起这一摊买卖。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - TW: 要想畫出好的皮囊，就得看遍美醜老少，摸過紅顏枯骨。否則，可騙不過那些精明的凡人，也圓不了那些個癡心妄念，撐不起這一攤買賣。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: Here is my rule: I paint all the features on the skin, except for the eyes. You use your own when you're back in the world of the living, however beautiful the other features I've created are. Ah, they have it right when they say that eyes are the window to the soul. What I wouldn't give for a pair of eyes like yours! So rare and so pure they are...
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - JP: ここでのルールは皮だけを描くこと。瞳は描かない。どんなに美しい顔を描いても、地上に戻れば自分の目しか使えないのだから。はぁ、魚や雁が圧倒されるほどの皮を描くのは簡単だが、花も恥じらい月も隠れるような瞳には滅多に出会えない。君のような澄んだ瞳は世界にいくつあるのだろうか？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - KR: 껍데기만 그리고 눈은 그리지 않는 게 내 원칙이야. 아무리 예쁜 껍데기를 그려줘도 속세로 돌아가면 본인의 눈으로 봐야 하는 법이거든. 흠~ 아름다운 껍데기는 그리기 쉽지만, 맑고 깊은 눈은 그리기 어려워, 너처럼 투명한 눈이 이 세상에 얼마나 더 있겠어?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - CN: 我这儿的规矩就是只画皮，不点睛，无论给你画了多好看的皮，回到尘世，都只能用自己的眼睛。呵~沉鱼落雁的皮囊好画，闭月羞花的眼瞳难求，像你这样剔透的眼睛，世间又能有几双呢？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - TW: 我這的規矩就是只畫皮，不點睛，無論給你畫了多好看的皮，回到塵世，都只能用自己的眼睛。呵，沉魚落雁的皮囊好畫，閉月羞花的眼瞳難求，像你這樣剔透的眼睛，世間又能有幾雙呢？
voicelines.Idle - EN: The cheekbone area needs a touch-up... Ah, still not as good as I hoped. Perhaps the bone structure itself is flawed. I need to start over.
voicelines.Idle - JP: 頬骨はもう少し描いてもよさそうだが……期待していたほどではないな。骨の作りに問題があるのかもしれない。一からやり直すか……
voicelines.Idle - KR: 광대를 좀 더 수정해야 하는데… 효과가 별로 안 좋네. 얼굴 자체를 잘 못 만든 거 같아, 처음부터 다시 해야겠어…
voicelines.Idle - CN: 颧骨可以再添两笔……效果不如预期啊。也许骨相就扎得有问题，得从头来过……
voicelines.Idle - TW: 顴骨可以再添兩筆……效果不如預期啊。也許骨相就扎得有問題，得從頭來過……
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: Will you stop tugging at my sleeve? You're making my hand tremble. If the buyer goes home with a pockmarked face, they might visit your bedside in the middle of the night to give you a dressing-down.
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: ここで勝手に動いたり私の袖を引っ張ったりしないでくれ。もし私の手が震えてそばかすだらけの顔ができたら、依頼者が夜中に君のベッドに忍び込んで怒鳴るだろうね。
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 정신 사납게 잡아당기지 좀 마, 너 때문에 손이 흔들려서 못생긴 얼굴로 그려지면, 한밤중에 내 고객이 네 침대 머리맡에 나타나 욕을 퍼부을지도 몰라.
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 可别在这里动手动脚地扯我衣袖，要是让我手抖画了张麻子脸出来，小心买主半夜溜到你床头骂你。
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 可別在這裡動手動腳地扯我衣袖，要是讓我手抖畫了張麻子臉出來，小心買主半夜溜到你床頭罵你。
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: You like watching me work? You can watch, but you'd better not disturb me, or... I might claim your most striking feature for myself.
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: 私の仕事姿が好き？それなら、ただ傍で見ていればいい。私の邪魔はしないでくれ。そうでなければ……君の顔の最も美しい部分を、私のものにするぞ。
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 내가 일하는 모습이 그렇게 좋아? 그럼 한쪽에서 보기만 해, 방해는 하지 말고, 그렇지 않으면… 네 얼굴에서 가장 예쁜 부분을 빼앗아 가버릴 거야.
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 喜欢看我干活？那在一边看着就好，别影响我，否则……我可要把你脸上最漂亮的东西，占为己有了。
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 喜歡看我幹活？那在一邊看著就好，別影響我，否則……我可要把你臉上最漂亮的東西，占為己有了。
voicelines.Level Up - EN: My works have been "superficial", but from now on, I'll be able to capture the essence of the subject.
voicelines.Level Up - JP: 昔は、皮や肉や骨を描いてきた……これからは、精神や気質を描くことができる。
voicelines.Level Up - KR: 과거엔 그저 껍데기와 육신만을 그려냈지만… 이젠 원기를 그려낼 수 있겠어.
voicelines.Level Up - CN: 从前画皮肉骨……今后，就能画精气神了。
voicelines.Level Up - TW: 從前畫皮肉骨……今後，就能畫精氣神了。
